glsa.title: LZO: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: An integer overflow in LZO might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: LZO is an extremely fast compression and decompression library

description.p: LZO is vulnerable to an integer overflow condition in the “lzo1x_decompress_safe” function which could result in a possible buffer overrun when processing maliciously crafted compressed input data.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send specially crafted compressed input data possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition or arbitrary code execution.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
